description: A woman in her 30s is in hospital with serious leg injuries, police say.
title: Attempted murder arrest after woman struck by car
title_page: Kidderminster: Attempted murder arrest after woman struck by car - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been arrested on suspicion of attempted murder after police said a woman was struck by a car outside a pub in Kidderminster.
Officers were called to the incident in the car park of the Hare and Hounds pub on Stourbridge Road at about 17:15 GMT on Saturday, involving a grey Audi A4.
West Mercia Police said the victim, a woman in her 30s, suffered serious leg injuries and remained in hospital.
Following the incident, a man in his 30s was arrested on suspicion of attempted murder and is in police custody.
